sentences.sentence: You can learn everything, including daftness.
sentences.translation: 学习可以学会一切，包括愚笨。

sentences.sentence: But more interesting than the daftness of Jack Russells is the evidence that this country of alleged dog-lovers is actually one of the least dog-loving nations of all.
sentences.translation: 不过，比笨头笨脑的杰克拉塞尔梗还要有意思的是，已经有证据表明，这个被说成是爱狗的国家实际上是最不喜欢狗的国家之一。
